parameters.name: FaceList
parameters.description: in-process, unmanaged C++: Pointer to an array of faces of size NumOfFaces to delete VBA, VB.NET, C#, and C++/CLI: Not supported See In-process Methods for details about this type of method.

parameters.name: DoLocalCheck
parameters.description: True to perform a local check, false to not

parameters.name: UsePlanarCap
parameters.description: True to use planar caps, false to not (see Remarks )

title: IBody2.IDeleteBlends3
description: Removes a set of fillet faces from a temporary body and heals the body.
signature:
System.Boolean IDeleteBlends3( 
   System.Int32
NumOfFaces
,
   ref Face2
FaceList
,
   System.Boolean
DoLocalCheck
,
   System.Boolean
UsePlanarCap
)

parameters.name: FaceList
parameters.description: in-process, unmanaged C++: Pointer to an array of faces of size NumOfFaces to delete VBA, VB.NET, C#, and C++/CLI: Not supported See In-process Methods for details about this type of method.

parameters.name: DoLocalCheck
parameters.description: True to perform a local check, false to not

parameters.name: UsePlanarCap
parameters.description: True to use planar caps, false to not (see Remarks )

returns: True if the set of fillet faces are removed, false if not
remarks: Typically when deleting blends, an entire chain of blends are deleted. However, if only a few blends are deleted from a chain of blends and the UsePlanarCap parameter is not set to true, then the resultant body might be invalid.
